title: Product to a Power
text: Use the definition of product to power, $${ab}^m=a^m b^m$$
speech: Use the definition of product to power,  a b to the m-th, is equal to, a to the m-th b to the m-th

title: Properties of Negative Exponents
text: Use the definition of negative exponent, $$a^{\left(-n\right)}=\frac{1}{a^n}$$
speech: Use the definition of negative exponent,  a raised to the parentheses negative n  power is equal to, fraction, 1 over, a to the n-th,
